item.title: Loosely-coupled Serverless Functions With Apache Openwhisk
item.description: Just like software engineering, best practices for serverless applications advise keeping functions small and focused on a single task, aka “do one thing and do it well". Small single-purpose functions are easier to develop, test and debug. üëç But what happens when you need execute multiple asynchronous tasks (implemented as separate functions) from an incoming event, like an API request? ü§î Functions Calling Functions? Functions can invoke other functions directly, using asynchronous calls through the client SDK.
